title: The Trashcan Opera Society
description: The is the story of Jordan, a well educated homeless man who, by the result of an accident, meets an aging, exotic dancer named Hannah. Jordan walked away from the practice of law and has slipped away from his prior lifestyle. He now lives on the streets. He has learned to survive using a variety of schemes to make money. He lives part of the time in a homeless shelter and other times with Hannah.Jordan developed a love of opera during his time in law school. Despite his homelessness, he buys still buys the best annual season tickets to the opera, These tickets allow him to sit with the wealthiest opera fans in the city.Hannah reveals a great secret to Jordan and demands his promise to fulfill a special wish. Together, Hannah and Jordan form a team to live a life without compromise and with love.
author: Marc McVey
